title: CCRAS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 03 Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Central Council for Research in Ayurvedic Sciences (CCRAS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Senior Research Fellow, Junior Research Fellow Jobs. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M. Pharm, B. Pharm, and M.Sc can apply for the CCRAS Recruitment 2025 . Interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the...
